plot: Bosko and Honey yodel happily in the Alps until a series of disasters end with Honey rushing downriver on an ice floe.
title: Yodeling Yokels
plot_es: Bosko and Honey yodel happily in the Alps until a series of disasters end with Honey rushing downriver on an ice floe.
plot_en: Bosko and Honey yodel happily in the Alps until a series of disasters end with Honey rushing downriver on an ice floe.
